page.title: 14Transport
page.content: In Bagnall there are two main types of transport in Winter.The first one is the mini-bus which takes the children to school,this also arrives in Summer.The second is the Tractor. The mini-bus is owned by the Potteries Motor Traction Company and this takes them to school and brings them back again. Nearly all the residents in Bagnall own 1 or more cars,some own Land Rovers due to their profession-farming. In Winter the Farmers are payed by the police to clear the lanes with a tractor with a snow plough attached to the front to make the lanes passable.
